title: Lake Maracaibo
creator_credit: Boris Woronzow, Unidad Filmica and Shell
brief_description: For centuries Lake Maracaibo, on the north-western coast of Venezuela, and the surrounding countryside have been the home of fishermen and shepherds. Today with the discovery of oil, swampland and savanna are being converted into industrial sites and residential districts.
description: For centuries Lake Maracaibo, on the north-western coast of Venezuela, and the surrounding countryside have been the home of fishermen and shepherds. Today with the discovery of oil, swampland and savanna are being converted into industrial sites and residential districts.
